name: TamTamy
tag_list: social-network, enterprise-social-networking, social-media, community-management, enterprise-2-0, software-engineering, events, web-2-0, innovation, social-enterprise
overview: TamTamy’s mission is to help businesses design and develop tools and practices of social media. TamTamy operates in the market since 2007, its core is the proprietary Platform used to build social relationships within and outside the enterprise among employees, stakeholders, partners and customers. The Platform is continuously improved to provide the most recent features of social interaction, communication and collaboration, leveraging open standards and a friendly user experience. Along with evolving the Platform, TamTamy offers consulting services aimed at providing its customers with tailor made social engagement solutions. TamTamy is trademark of Reply, with headquarters in Milan and offices in Germany and UK.
